review.title: “A good learning ground for automation solution.”
review.pros: Pros – Throughout the year with this company, I had learn a lots of automation knowledge from software to mechanical. As an engineer position I took the challenge offer by my management to be a sales and marketing executive. Today I am the asst. Manager to my director of this company. There are plenty of opportunities to be growth in this company but unfortunately I would like expand my horizons and conquer new challenges to work aboard.
review.cons: Cons – There are not much downsides I could share as I was happy with the management and my job here. This company had given me a lots of opportunity to growth.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give a chance to the staff who whish to growth and expand to the next level.
